STARTER: Do you have any pets? How long have you had them, and what do you like most about them?
text:
[Starter]: Do you have any pets? How long have you had them, and what do you like most about them?
[Student]: be the way had int not the just knows a see of that a you he to I want I We my I
[Teacher]: can like Yes, I have pets. I have two dogs and one cat. I've had them for about 3 years now. I like most about them is their loyalty and companionship. They always greet me at the door when I come home, and they're always happy to see me, no matter how long I've been away. They also love to play and cuddle, and they always make me laugh with their silly antics.
